author: camolezi
body:
#### PR description:
Replaced boost library use for C++ STL alternatives. The code should have similar behavior. 
Also removed some includes that were unused. 

#### PR validation:
Passed on basic runTheMatrix test.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

@vgvassilev @davidlange6
title: Replaced boost for standard alternatives in PhysicsTools/Utilities
